value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI. We can perform forecasting with a Line chart in Power BI.  In this video, we have taken an example of a real-life scenario to forecast our data.  Stay Connected

value.title: How to Display SharePoint Images to Power BI?
value.excerpt: During this session, we will learn how we can display SharePoint Images to Power BI. Most of the time we have a question in our mind that, how we can load SharePoint Document Library Images to Power BI? The procedure is very simple and straight forward. We need to use SharePoint Folder connector to load

value.title: How to Sync Two Slicers on the Same Page in Power BI?
value.excerpt: During this session, we will talk about Advanced Properties for the Sync Slicer in Power BI. Sometimes we have a scenario where want functionality that if we select some value from the slicer the same value should be selected from another slicer on the same page. value.title: Power BI Shows Incorrect Measure Total? How to fix it?
value.excerpt: During this session, we will try to resolve one of the most common issues that occur in Power BI Desktop which is Incorrect Measure Total issue for table or matrix visual. Sometimes, we have multiple tables in our report and we have prepared some DAX expression to calculate some values in our report.

value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway
value.excerpt: This video was based on a call I had last week relating to troubleshooting connectivity to a SQL Server named instance from the Power BI gateway. This is really my thought process for how I handle connection errors to a data source from any application.    LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: A TWIST on dynamically filtering visuals by a slicer in Power BI

value.title: How to use the Power BI Aggregations Feature

Christian Wade on Twitter - @_christianWade  LET'S CONNECT!

value.title: Power BI parameters - Updating in the Power BI Service or with APIs
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can update Power BI parameters within the service or by using APIs. You can create Power BI Parameters within Power BI Desktop using Power Query. value.excerpt: The Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API allow you to quickly inventory your organization and manage workspaces and access. value.title: Power BI URL Filter Updates (August 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at the recent updates to using the Power BI URL Filter. The update to using URL Filter parameters in Power BI include updates to operators along with the ability to use more than strings and spaces in table names!
